top_comments.comment:
One of the best things I've heard ... chills... and I've been playing for thirty-five years ... 
You are a gift to all of us Allie ... Thanks 🙏🏻♥ ️
Wow i like it more than the original you r amazing 🙏♥️

Allie owns this song. Best I’ve heard in this outdoor venue. It’s very difficult to sound this good out of doors without professional sound techs. It shows how strong and wonderful her voice really is.

comments_since_last_sample.body: The audience is so mesmerized by this incredible voice!!!
You are amazing Allie... my heartfelt reply to a heartfelt song.
Allieeee beautiful ❤️🙌🙌🙌🙌
I swear if you perform in my city I will go shopping everyday

Allie makes these songs come Alive!
Very well done, always looking forward to the next one :)
You sounded beautiful Allie. Great emotion, mood and nice timbre in your voice. Great performance.
VERY NICE MISS ALLIE SHERLOCK ;-)
allie Sherlock sei la piu grande che voce fantastica
This is insane❤
Excellent
Outstanding ❤️❤️

Allie owns this song. Best I’ve heard in this outdoor venue. It’s very difficult to sound this good out of doors without professional sound techs. It shows how strong and wonderful her voice really is.
Wow i like it more than the original you r amazing 🙏♥️

Zum Samstag für die schwarzgekleidete Allie ... von Adele mag ich Rolling in the deep ... der Apocalypto ging nicht zu überspielen ... Der mit dem Wolf tanzt müsste gehen ... dein Auftritt hier ging mir sehr nah, ich habe geweint und hatte Tränen in den Augen ... vielleicht auch deswegen Allie, weil ich Dir die Emails schickte ... ich würde Dir höchstens noch mal am Heiligabend eine E-Mail schreiben und Fröhliche Weihnachten wünschen ... der erste Song ist über Helene, es ist abgewandelt ... da existierte nur die gekürzte erste Strophe mit Chorus ... Du und ich auf einem Track Allie ...

Wow!!! Amazing ❤️ 
God bless you
AMAZING
Adele called-shes looking for voice lessons
Элли, золотко... Радость ты наша! Спасибо...
